title: Logical Psycho
description: A man becomes infected by a hand puppet... An assassin must protect her infant son... A boxer fights for a second chance... A boy runs afoul of the law... Action, thriller, comedy, sci-fi, romance, horror - All genres of fiction are on full display in this anthology of short stories from Mike Miller. No two tales are alike in this wildly eclectic and entertaining collection.
author: Mike  Miller
